title: Digital and Cyber Security Awareness
headline: Learn proper digital citizenship as well as cyber security awareness with this free online course.
description: This free online course teaches students about digital citizenship and cyber security awareness. The course will go over best practices for sharing online, as well as proper digital etiquette. Students will also learn about networking and personal branding. The course will also teach students about cyber security and protecting from cyber attacks. "So, why wait? Start this course today and learn about digital citizenship and cyber security.
courseDescription:
This course, Digital and Cyber Security Awareness, will provide you with an understanding of the Digital Citizenship as well as Cyber Security Awareness. You will learn What digital citizenship is and how it effects you online. You will be able to explain being a good citizen and best practices for sharing. You will also learn about networking and personal branding and how to use it for proper self promotion.

This course then explains digital security and safety as well as digital etiquette. You will learn about cyber security fundamentals to properly protect your files and personal information. You will also learn about the different types of cyber security breaches. These include types of malware as well as types of cyber attacks.

This course then wraps up Prevention Tips to help prevent various cyber attacks on both desktop and mobile. You will learn prevention software that you can use to protect your devices and how to protect social media. By taking this course you will learn how to properly display yourself and keep yourself secure online. So why wait? Start learning today.
